tool_purpose: Calculates the concrete volume required for a cylindrical concrete column or pillar.

inputs.label: Column Diameter
inputs.explanation: The diameter of the concrete column.

inputs.label: Column Height
inputs.explanation: The vertical height of the column.

outputs.label: Concrete Volume
outputs.description: Concrete volume required for the column.

outputs.label: Concrete Volume
outputs.description: Concrete volume required for the column in cubic yards.

assumptions: No waste or overage is included.

tool_notes.title: How this calculator works
tool_notes.text: This calculator uses the volume formula for a cylinder based on column diameter and height.

tool_notes.title: When to use this calculator
tool_notes.text: Use this calculator for concrete columns, pillars, or vertical supports.

seo.meta_description: Calculate the concrete volume needed for cylindrical concrete columns or pillars.
